title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.14 - Unauthorized retention of licenses, registrations and other instruments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง 1.14 - Unauthorized retention of licenses, registrations and other instruments

State Regulations

No person shall retain possession of any license, permit, registration card, badge or other means of identification or instrument issued
by the commission after his license, permit or registration has expired, been
terminated, revoked or suspended for a period of more than 30
days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21ยง
1.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
